Yes, Always. But, you need to know the truth first. Truth has two forms:- Relative truth - this type of truth is different for different people and it depends on the stage of evolution of the subject. In other words, your truth changes with the change of your intellect and understanding. For example, things that you considered true and genuine in your childhood is not the same today. Some things underwent modifications and other things changed entirely & this process keeps on continuing.Absolute truth - Such truth never changes. It stands notwithstanding your situation, position and understanding. Therefore, know the truth & you will get your answer. And the PATH starts from you ( ie. Know YOURSELF and you will know everything). Nothing lies beyond you……. ..
